import java.io.*;
public class Main {
    public static void main(String args[]) throws IOException
    {
        BufferedReader input=new BufferedReader(new InputStreamReader(System.in));
        PrintWriter out=new PrintWriter(System.out);
        int a=0,b=0,c=0,d=0,e=0;
        java.util.StringTokenizer st=new java.util.StringTokenizer(input.readLine());
        while(st.hasMoreTokens())
        {
            a=Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
            b=Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
            c=Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
            d=Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
            e=Integer.parseInt(st.nextToken());
        }
        int best = Integer.MAX_VALUE;
        int t = a + b - c * d / e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
        t = a + b - c / d * e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a + b * c - d / e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a + b * c / d - e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a + b / c - d * e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a + b / c * d - e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a - b + c * d / e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a - b + c / d * e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a - b * c + d / e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a - b * c / d + e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a * b + c - d / e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a * b + c / d - e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a * b - c + d / e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a * b - c / d + e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a * b / c + d - e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a * b / c - d + e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a / b + c - d * e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a / b + c * d - e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a / b - c + d * e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a / b - c * d + e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a / b * c + d - e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a / b * c - d + e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a - b / c + d * e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
	t = a - b / c * d + e;
	if (t > 0 && t < best)
            best = t;
        out.println(best);
        out.flush();
    }
}
